comment.language: On the Feast of the Entrance of Our Lord into Jerusalem (Hosanna Sunday):
On the Feast of the Entrance of Our Lord into Jerusalem (Hosanna Sunday):

text.language: Ps/ri m~V]: afse e~qoun e~Il#/#m#: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
The Son of God, entered into Jerusalem. Save us and have mercy on us.
Putra Allah, yang telah masuk ke Yerusalem. Selamatkanlah dan kasihanilah kami.
ابن الله دخل أورشليم خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.
